content.html: I've posted to the WordPress Forums as well as the JanRain dev mailing list, so we'll see what people have to say. My thinking on the matter: - it's a valid http request, so Bad Behavior should allow it, regardless - I don't **want** to ship a modified version of the JanRain library if I can at all keep from it - I **will** ship a modified version of the library if we need to, but I want some more information before doing so
